query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 1 as ID, 'Failed' as Status, COUNT(*) as Count FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'FAIL' UNION SELECT 2 as ID, 'Unprocessed' as Status, COUNT(*) as Count FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'UNPC' UNION SELECT 3 as ID, 'Processed' as Status, COUNT(*) as Count FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'PROC' ) AS T ORDER BY ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 1 ID, 'Failed' Status, COUNT(*) Count FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'FAIL' UNION SELECT 2 ID, 'Unprocessed' Status, COUNT(*) Count FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'UNPC' UNION SELECT 3 ID, 'Processed' Status, COUNT(*) Count FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'PROC' ) T ORDER BY ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE, COUNT(*) 'COUNT' FROM SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 GROUP BY STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE
query.sfwOracle: SELECT STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 GROUP BY STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE

query.sfwSql: SELECT STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE, COUNT(*) 'COUNT' FROM SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time and @end_time + 1 GROUP BY STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE
query.sfwOracle: SELECT STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1 GROUP BY STATUS_ID, STATUS_VALUE

query.sfwSql: SELECT REQUEST_ID, PERSON_ID, SBR.ORG_ID, O.ORG_CODE, O.ORG_NAME, SBP.NAME AS PROCESSNAME, SBR.STATUS_ID, SBR.STATUS_VALUE, SBR.PROCESSED_BY_MACHINE, SBR.SERVER_NAME, SBR.CREATED_DATE FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBR.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID AND SBR.STATUS_VALUE IN ('FAIL', 'UNPC') LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBR.ORG_ID=O.ORG_ID WHERE SBR.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1 ORDER BY SBR.CREATED_DATE DESC
query.sfwOracle: SELECT REQUEST_ID, PERSON_ID, ORG_ID, SBP.NAME AS PROCESSNAME, SBR.STATUS_ID, SBR.STATUS_VALUE, SBR.PROCESSED_BY_MACHINE, SBR.SERVER_NAME, SBR.CREATED_DATE FROM SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP ON SBR.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID AND SBR.STATUS_VALUE IN ('FAIL', 'UNPC') WHERE SBR.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1 ORDER BY SBR.CREATED_DATE DESC

query.sfwSql: SELECT TRACE_INSTANCE_ID, ENGINE_NAME, MACHINE_NAME, USER_ID, PARAMETER_DETAILS, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATED_DATE FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE SBTI WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE SBTI.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1 GROUP BY ENGINE_NAME, MACHINE_NAME, USER_ID, PARAMETER_DETAILS, TRACE_INSTANCE_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATED_DATE
query.sfwOracle: SELECT TRACE_INSTANCE_ID, ENGINE_NAME, MACHINE_NAME, USER_ID, PARAMETER_DETAILS, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATED_DATE FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE SBTI WHERE SBTI.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1 GROUP BY ENGINE_NAME, MACHINE_NAME, USER_ID, PARAMETER_DETAILS, TRACE_INSTANCE_ID, START_TIME, END_TIME, CREATED_DATE

query.sfwSql: SELECT 1 AS PRIMARY_KEY, SBST.*, SBSS.*, SS.SERVER_NAME, SBST.ENABLED FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID ORDER BY SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT 1 AS PRIMARY_KEY, SBST.*, SBSS.*, SS.SERVER_NAME, SBST.ENABLED FROM SGW_BPM_SERVICE_TIMER SBST LEFT JOIN SGW_BPM_SERVER_SETTINGS SBSS ON SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID = SBSS.SERVICE_TIMER_ID INNER JOIN SGS_SERVERS SS ON SBSS.SERVER_ID = SS.SERVER_ID ORDER BY SBST.SERVICE_TIMER_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT MACHINE_NAME, SBQ.STATUS_ID, SBQ.STATUS_VALUE, SBP.NAME AS PROCESSNAME, SBA.NAME AS ACTIVITYNAME, SBQ.CREATED_DATE FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SBPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBQ.SRC_PRCS_INST_ID = SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBPI.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE SBC WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBC.CASE_ID = SBP.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SBAI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBQ.ACTV_INST_ID_TO_EXEC = SBAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SBA.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SBQ.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1
query.sfwOracle: SELECT MACHINE_NAME, SBQ.STATUS_ID, SBQ.STATUS_VALUE, SBP.NAME AS PROCESSNAME, SBA.NAME AS ACTIVITYNAME, SBQ.CREATED_DATE FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SBPI ON SBQ.SRC_PRCS_INST_ID = SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP ON SBPI.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE SBC ON SBC.CASE_ID = SBP.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SBAI ON SBQ.ACTV_INST_ID_TO_EXEC = SBAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SBA ON SBAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SBA.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SBQ.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1

query.sfwSql: SELECT DISTINCT ENGINE_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 ORDER BY ENGINE_NAME
query.sfwOracle: SELECT DISTINCT ENGINE_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE WHERE START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 ORDER BY ENGINE_NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBTIA.ACTION_TYPE, COUNT(*) AS PROCESSED_COUNT FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE SBTI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN SBTIA ON SBTI.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = SBTIA.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID AND SBTI.ENGINE_NAME = @ENGINE_NAME INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN_DTL SBTIAD ON SBTIA.TRANSACTION_ID = SBTIAD.TRANSACTION_ID AND SBTI.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 GROUP BY ACTION_TYPE, SBTI.ENGINE_NAME
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SBTIA.ACTION_TYPE, COUNT(*) PROCESSED_COUNT FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE SBTI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN SBTIA ON SBTI.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = SBTIA.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID AND SBTI.ENGINE_NAME = @ENGINE_NAME INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_TRACE_INST_ACTN_DTL SBTIAD ON SBTIA.TRANSACTION_ID = SBTIAD.TRANSACTION_ID AND SBTI.CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 GROUP BY ACTION_TYPE, SBTI.ENGINE_NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT 'Failed' as ActionType, COUNT(*) as Count FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'FAIL' UNION SELECT 'Unprocessed', COUNT(*) FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'UNPC' UNION SELECT 'Picked', COUNT(*) FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'PICK'
query.sfwOracle: SELECT 'Failed' ActionType, COUNT(*) Count FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'FAIL' UNION SELECT 'Unprocessed' ActionType, COUNT(*) Count FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'UNPC' UNION SELECT 'Picked' ActionType, COUNT(*) Count FROM SGW_BPM_QUEUE SBQ WHERE CREATED_DATE BETWEEN @START_DATE AND @END_DATE + 1 AND STATUS_VALUE = 'PICK'

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBPE.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID, SBPE.SUB_TRANSACTION_ID, ENGINE_NAME, METHOD_NAME, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, EXCEPTION_DATE, TRANSACTION_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESSING_ERROR SBPE WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE SBTI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBPE.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = SBTI.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SBAI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBPE.SUB_TRANSACTION_ID = SBAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID AND SBPE.EXCEPTION_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SBPE.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID, SBPE.SUB_TRANSACTION_ID, ENGINE_NAME, METHOD_NAME, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, EXCEPTION_DATE, TRANSACTION_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESSING_ERROR SBPE INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE SBTI ON SBPE.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID = SBTI.TRACE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SBAI ON SBPE.SUB_TRANSACTION_ID = SBAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID AND SBPE.EXCEPTION_DATE BETWEEN @start_time AND @end_time + 1

query.sfwSql: SELECT Count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1
query.sfwOracle: SELECT Count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_TRACE_INSTANCE WHERE START_TIME BETWEEN @START_TIME AND @END_TIME + 1 ORDER BY ENGINE_NAME
